text: Pully is a municipality in the district of Lavaux-Oron in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. It is one of the eastern suburbs of the city of Lausanne, located on the shores of Lake Geneva (Lac LÃ©man) and at the foot of the vineyards of Lavaux on the road to Vevey and Montreux. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Municipalities in Lavaux-Oron Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Pully
